name: Descentipede
description:
There is a lot to get used to in the mechanics of the game with splitting and joining and moving, and there are still a lot of movement bugs. In the pause menu there is a controls pop up to help.

The goal of the game is to get as many parts as you can into the home goal. The levels should help ease you into the mechanics.

While in the splitting mode, press up or down to increase or decrease the amount of parts to split up.
